metadata.title: FA Understand 09 05

config.question: Which of the following did Marshall support in both McCulloch v. Maryland and Gibbons v. Ogden?

choices.content: growth of a national market economy

answer_3.response: Consider This: In major decisions between 1819 and 1824, the Marshall Court enhanced judicial power. The Court also used the contract clause of the Constitution to limit the power of state legislatures. See L.O. 9.3 What decisions did the federal government face as the country expanded?
